extensionDescription.message: Captures the web page into local storage and manages captured pages in browser sidebar. Compatible with ScrapBook documents.

STEP1_TEXT_1.message: Download ScrapBee backend executable and 2 installation file to"{DOWNLOAD_DESTINATION_DIRECTORY}/screepbee/", by just click on the button below.

STEP1_TEXT_2.message: You maybe meet problem that Firefox does not download the 3 files correctly, then you can close Firefox and remove files under"{DOWNLOAD_DESTINATION_DIRECTORY}/screepbee/", start Firefox and download again. And, Please use standart version of {Firefox} at least 60。

STEP2_TEXT_1.message: Run the installation script downloaded above manually:

STEP2_TEXT_2.message: Run the commands in your terminal:

STEP2_TEXT_3.message: You maybe need to run the script as administrator

RDF_FILES_TIP.message:
Set rdf files ending with extension '.rdf' to register information of scraps，downloaded scraps will be saved in directory "data" under the same directory of the rdf file.

For example： c:\scrapbee\test.rdf (Windows)
or：
/home/userID/scrapbee/test.rdf (Linux)
/Users/userID/scrapbee/test.rdf (Mac)

you can setup multiple rdf files to classify your scraps，
You can have different rdfs inside same directory.
No need to create these files maunally.

And here's a good news for ScrapBook user, that ScrapBook rdfs are also supported.

BACKEND_PORT_TIP.message: TCP port ScrapBee backend server listens. e.g. 9900

COLOR_TIP.message:
Change color of some elements to make ScrapBee a better looking.
These colors should be in format: #FFFFFF or #FFF

OPEN_IN_CURRENT_TAB_TIP.message:
By default, ScrapBee opens each scrap in new tab when clicking on an entity,
and open scrap in current tab by holding control(meta for Mac) while clicking.
You can reverse this by checkon on the option.

DONATE_WORDS.message:
To make ScrapBee grows better,
your donations are very welcome,
thanks for your support !!!

ConfirmDeleteDirectory.message: This is a folder, do you really want delete it and items within it?

SAME_RDF_MODIFIED.message: Same rdf modified, click OK to refresh
